alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Eastern Polk; Greater Rutherford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:05PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN RUTHERFORD... SOUTHEASTERN POLK...SOUTHWESTERN CLEVELAND...SPARTANBURG AND NORTHWESTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Spartanburg, or near Boiling Springs SC, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Boiling Springs SC, Boiling Springs NC, Duncan, Lyman, Cowpens, Wellford, Inman, Mayo, and Roebuck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
